abstract: Sports collective Tatane and concert hall Philharmonie de Paris jointly host classical music concert by students from Regional Conservatoire of Paris to accompany broadcast of European Championships soccer match between Croatia and Spain.
lead_paragraph: In a concert hall in Paris, an orchestra provided an eclectic musical backdrop to Croatia’s victory against Spain on Tuesday in the European Championships.

headline.main: Croatia Beat Spain, 2-1, but the Notable Score Came From the Orchestra
headline.print_headline: Result Was 2-1, but the Notable Score Came From the Orchestra

snippet: In a concert hall in Paris, an orchestra provided an eclectic musical backdrop to Croatia’s victory against Spain on Tuesday in the European Championships.
